Package org.opensearch.sdk.ssl

Class DefaultSslKeyStore

java.lang.Object
org.opensearch.sdk.ssl.DefaultSslKeyStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
SslKeyStore
public class DefaultSslKeyStore extends Object implements SslKeyStore
Default SSL Key Store. This class contains methods to setup SSL for an extension
